EmailTemplate.name: Feature Request - Follow Up Directions
EmailTemplate.subject: Re: {!Case.Subject}
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Thanks again for the feedback! I went ahead and filed a feature request for this. While I donâ€™t have an exact timeline right now, you can follow the Retool Changelog/Release Notes for product updates to see if and when this gets implemented. I'll go ahead and close out this ticket now, but please reach out to Retool Support if anything else comes up.
